name: Study of an Angel and of Drapery
description: Study of an Angel and of Drapery; Innocenzo da Imola (Italian, 1485 - 1550); Italy; about 1520; Black chalk and brown wash, with white gouache heightening on brown tinted paper, with corners removed; 25.7 × 19.5 cm (10 1/8 × 7 11/16 in.); 85.GG.289; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Study of an Angel and of Drapery
medium: Black chalk and brown wash, with white gouache heightening on brown tinted paper, with corners removed
